recipe_name: Cranberry Sauce with Apricots, Raisins, and Orange
ingredients: 1 cup orange juice, 1 cup water, 4 cups fresh cranberries,   +   3/4 cup sugar, 1 cup chopped dried apricots, 1 cup golden raisins, 1 tablespoon grated orange zest
nutrition: Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 2mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 19g 7%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 8mg 41%, Calcium 10mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 151mg 3%
